name: Kain & Kaes, Twin Shadows
name_ch: 追影雙刃 凱因＆凱斯
description: Twin thief brothers, one holding a crossbow, the other wielding a dagger. They wear black hooded attire, standing back-to-back in a dimly lit dungeon corridor illuminated by blue-green light. Silent assassins in darkness, one arrow one blade, hundred steps without sound.
description_ch: 一對雙胞胎盜賊兄弟，一人持弩，一人握著匕首。他們身穿黑色連帽裝束，在藍綠色燈光映照的陰暗地城走廊中背對背站著。黑暗中的默契刺殺者，一箭一刃，百步無聲。
